item.description:
Hello all,

You are cordially invited to a New Years Eve PJ Party. Wear your best most comfortable, funnest, loudest, silliest pajamas! Absolutely no Ho attire allowed! That goes for girls and guys. :) The party comes complete with PJ contest, noise makers, a calendar or wishes for the New Year burning ceremony (for those of you that have had a crappy 2011 it's very liberating) and a next day breakfast brunch if you plan on staying over.

Things to bring:

1 dollar for Nina our awesomeness organizer.

2011 Calendar (for the folks that had a crappy year!)

Air Mattress - if you plan on staying over and have one - I have a couple. No need to bring the pump, I have one. 

One brunch item - A stick of butter, dozen eggs, sausage links etc...

Anyone that doesn't want to stay over or can't make the party is welcome to brunch the next day - samething applies, bring one brunch item. :) We'll probably get rolling around 10am - ish.

Please let me know what you'd like to bring to the party - so I can plan the menu.

I'm soooo looking forward to this event, I think we will have some great laughs.

Parking logistics: Please do not park or block the front or the side of my house. Cranky Neighbors    :( There is plenty of street parking and parking at the funeral home and the CVS parking lot.

Please walk right on in when you get here - no need to knock!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Margaarriiiittttaaasss New Years Eve PJ Party with a New Years morning brunch
